fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Cuckoo Call**: Once per night, you can choose to mimic the abilities of another player. If your target uses their ability, you will use it as well. This ability cannot copy unique abilities or those with limited uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, the Cuckoo's mimicry becomes even more effective, allowing them to copy the abilities of multiple players in a single night.
- **Adaptive Plumage**: Your Basic defense will improve to Powerful if you successfully mimic the ability of a killing role.
